definition: to link up/to join together/to connect
to pierce through/to pass through/to be stringed together/string of 1000 cash
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)

sentences.english: It uses a simple, but sufficient example that ties together all of the topics in the book.
sentences.chinese: 全書使用簡單卻充足的例子把所有主題貫連起來。

sentences.english: There is a main street with stores and various government organizations.
sentences.chinese: 城區有一條主街貫連，兩邊擠滿着商店和各類機關。
